title: Canada Will Require All Air Travelers To Be Vaccinated, In A Broad New Policy
content:
1. Canada Will Require All Air Travelers To Be Vaccinated, In A Broad New Policy  NPR
  2. Canada plans to require air travelers, cruise passengers to have COVID vaccine  USA TODAY
  3. Canada will require all air, rail and most marine passengers to be vaccinated by the fall  CNN
  4. Canada will require people traveling on cruise ships and planes in the country to be vaccinated  Business Insider
  5. Canada will mandate COVID-19 vaccine for air and rail travel  The Points Guy
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Canada Will Require All Air Travelers To Be Vaccinated, In A Broad New Policy  NPR
Canada plans to require air travelers, cruise passengers to have COVID vaccine  USA TODAY
Canada will require all air, rail and most marine passengers to be vaccinated by the fall  CNN
Canada will require people traveling on cruise ships and planes in the country to be vaccinated  Business Insider
Canada will mandate COVID-19 vaccine for air and rail travel  The Points Guy

localize.title: カナダでは、すべての航空旅行者にワクチン接種を義務付ける方針を発表
加拿大将在一项广泛的新政策中要求所有航空旅行者接受疫苗接种
加拿大將在一項廣泛的新政策中要求所有航空旅行者接受疫苗接種
